Plant Based Diet.name: The Curious Kitchen
Plant Based Diet.description: Test your knowledge of plant-based staples and culinary traditions with this fun and informative quiz. From kosher guidelines to surprising fruit hybrids, discover fascinating facts about the foods we eat.

questions.text: Which of the following is a natural sugar found in most fruits?
Which of these foods is not traditionally considered kosher?
According to the USDA, which food group should you eat the most servings of per day?
What is the name of the fruit that is half tangerine and half grapefruit?
What is the principal ingredient in traditional cole slaw?
What important food crop is grown in fields called paddies?
Which of these foods is poisonous to dogs?
A pita is a type of what?
